meanings.definition: A person who works in a warehouse.
meanings.sent1: The warehouseman unloaded boxes from the truck.
meanings.sent2: The warehouseman organized the inventory on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The warehouseman joked that he had memorized the location of every item.
meanings.sent4: Like a diligent ant, the warehouseman tirelessly carried out his tasks.
meanings.sent5: The warehouseman's job is to keep track of all the products in the warehouse.

meanings.definition: A man who is employed to manage a warehouse.
meanings.sent1: The warehouseman oversees the daily operations of the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The warehouseman ensures that all shipments are processed efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The warehouseman proudly showed off his well-organized storage system.
meanings.sent4: The warehouseman steers the warehouse ship through the sea of logistics.
meanings.sent5: The warehouseman's role is crucial in maintaining order within the warehouse.
